amathya fayisar musthafata janapathi mal kiniththak palandawana ayuru dakwena chayarupa kihipayak ema amathyansha madhya eekakaya madhya wetha eewa thibenawa.janadhipathi maithripala sirisena samaga nila sancharayak sandaha katar rajya wetha pamini amathya fayisar musthafa ,uthsawayakata sahabhagiwimata pera mal kithiththak palandawana ayuru, yanuwen ehi sandahan kara thibenawa.

pasal paddhathiya thula aarambha kala waga katayuthu, widyathmaka krushikarmaya, gamata handunwadima, gami janathawata pasala thulin danuma sampreshanaya karawima, guwanwiduli sewa wani awidhimath adhyapana sewa salasum kirima, wadihiti panthi ha ingirasi panthi pawathwima magin, awidhimath adhyapana awastha pulul kirima siduwiya.
pansal gihin enakota mokadda pujawakata mamath thawa kihipa denekuth ahin dakka polisiyen allan yanawa.
